dict.string: Choose a field to search on

flags=()
test -n "$bibliography" && flags+=(--bibliography) test -n "$autopaste" && flags+=(--paste)
./zh copy $flags "$style" "$id"

flags=()
test -n "$notifytitle" && flags+=(--title "$notifytitle") test -n "$notifytext" && flags+=(--text "$notifytext")
./zh notify $flags

ZotHero =======
Search your Zotero database and copy citations.
Configuration -------------
Edit the `ZOTERO_DIR` variable to point to Zotero 5's data directory if you aren't using the default (~/Zotero).
Call normal search with category pre-filled
